name: Sentry Parental Controls
tag_list: child-protection, content-control, parental-control, internet-safety, grooming, chat-logging, internet-logging, timer, live-action, remote, vista, xp
overview: BLOCKS all inappropriate web sites from pornography, violence and gambling; as well as chat room and IM activities from online predators; access to applications and more. FILTERS all web sites and chat sessions for inappropriate content on the Internet by genre or keyword. MONITORS all Internet and Computer activity including browsing, chat sessions, applications and computer use. All logs are easy to access and read. ALERTS sent in real-time to your email inbox or mobile phone* instantly! Information includes what user has triggered the alert and what has been blocked/filtered. CONTROL time usage with our Computer and Internet timers. Control the mouse, keyboard, applications and computer settings - from any computer in the world via our 100% remote based control panel. PROTECTS your child from negative situations such as peer pressure, alcohol and drug use, violence, cyber bullying, grooming from online predators and much more!
